results.title: The Weekend – 07-26-25: Christian Music, AI Discussions, and Global Prayers
results.summary: Christianity Today's weekend edition highlights Christian hip-hop artist nobigdyl., who emphasizes authentic expression: "we’re gonna say what’s beautiful and true, regardless of the consequences." The issue also features discussions on AI, questioning, "Is human a matter of sentience? Is it a matter of intelligence?" and stressing the importance of a "robust and rock-solid theology of the image of God." Prayers are offered for World Vision, Christians in Gaza, and physical discipleship.
